TopicTitle: Looking for decoupler that hide advenced SAS module

Articles.Content:
I build rocked based on SATURN V but i have problem i want hide advanced SAS inside rocket casing

I uploaded my rocket
Find the NovaPunch remix mod, there are some nice long decoupler shrouds to 'cover unsightly rocket engines' - should be just what you're looking for!
